laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Marked prolongation of P100 wave latency noted three years later.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Multiple T2-hyperintense lesions without gadolinium enhancement initially; three years later, showed increased T2-lesion load and one gadolinium-enhancing lesion in the pons.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased lesion load over three years.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Increased protein content (82 mg/dL) with normal cell count; oligoclonal IgG bands restricted to CSF detected.
Onion bulbs and loss of myelinated fibers, without inflammatory infiltrates.
Tachycardia observed (133 beats/min). Ejection fraction of 42% with segmental left ventricular dysfunction.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Normal heart rate after next dose of PD medications.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Peak troponin T was 0.06 ng/mL (within normal range).

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Western blot immunoassay (antibodies to 68-kD bovine inner ear protein)
